name: Combat Strike Shooter
description:
The alien attack has begun, alien semi-robot soldiers are attacking the world.

It's your job to protect the world. With your command, human soldiers will attack aliens. Gather your team, take action to defend the world.

The aliens are so powerful that the mother ship that feeds them travels over the world. You will be sent to the space ship with a small team. Order your soldiers to die. Kill all the aliens. It will determine the fate of this relentless war. Combat Strike is a great 3D battle and action game. You can play both the third person shooter viewpoint and the first person shooter viewpoint.

Two different weapon system, Machine gun and Sniper Rifle.

Stay away from bomb. Be careful because aliens are very smart.

It consists of 100 parts which are challenging and exciting.
You are a fearless soldier and you must save the world.
You can strengthen your weapons.
5 different character and rank system
With stronger characters you can fight aliens more easily.
publishers: BROBABIL IC VE DIS TICARET LTD STI
